cz.cuni.mff.kocur.graphics

Class WindowedJPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.graphics.BuildableJPanel
              • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.graphics.WindowedJPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buildable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainAgentConfigurationEntry, MainBotInfoEntry

    public abstract class WindowedJPanel
extends BuildableJPanel
    This class main purpose is to create a JPanel that looks like a small window inside the application. That means it has simple header with options to hide or remove the "window" from parent.
    Author:
    Banzindun
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
